examples:
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Took money from my account before its due date. My 30-day trial is supposed to end on the 22nd & subscription begins on 23rd. I was going to cancel my free trial today so that my card wouldn't be billed, but you all took it todsy. The invoice that was sent to me has tomorrow's date on it & my card should NOT have been billed TODAY!!! I have since canceled my 30-day free trial of Canva & would like for the money to be placed back on my card.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot I did the 30 day free trial. I have not used this app since then and I would like a refund please. I have no money to waste.

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I want the post refund I wanted a specific function but I saw that the service you do not have. And by my right I have a period of up to 30 days to give up any purchase and get my money back.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, hope all is well! Was wondering if I'd be able to get a refund on my premium subscription. I signed up for the free 30 day trial and never used it and then forgot about it. Please let me know if this is possible, thanks!

What do you need help with?: Hi, I signed up for the  30 day free trial and only wanted the 30 days. I was expecting a notification or email when my 30 days was up. I did not receive one and was charged  the $119.40. I would like to  cancel my subscription and get the money back please. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi - Can you please refund me the $12.95 you charged me a day ago please? I thought I cancelled my account the same day I created it but I just received an invoice. I have not used Canva since the day I signed up and would greatly appreciate if you can refund me back my money please.

Thank you,
Tina <NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, i do not find Canva pro to be worth the money and would like my money refunded. I meant to cancel before the 30 day was over but have been very busy during the holiday. Please if you can refund me as soon as possible.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up for a 30 day trial, and was promised that I would be emailed to see if I wanted to continue services. I do not want to continue. Please refund me this payment

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried the 30 day free and I do not require the subscription. I tried to cancel before the due date but your system would not allow me to do so and now I am charged. I request a refund please. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this subscription 2 days before the 30-day trial ended. It should not have been charged.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled on the final day of the trial but have still been charged. Please can you refund as soon as possible. 

Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi,
I appreciate you allowing me to use Canva for 30 days for free. At the end of the 30 days I decided that Canva was not for me and canceled my trial, however, I was still charged.

Do you know why this is? Thank you again!

Invoice no .: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: My brother, you initially offer 30 days free service. You are not saying that we will automatically withdraw money without notifying you afterwards. Return that money now. Let's not be in court.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I clicked on a free 30 days trial and have been charged and started a subscription.  I have not been notified about this charge and do not want to subscribe for Pro at this stage without trying it first for free. Please cancel and refund me Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up for the 30 day free trial as it popped up - I did not actually want to subscribe

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have not used my subscription in the last 30 days and want a refund and to cancel my subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please cancel my subscription and issue me a full refund.  I only wanted the 30-day trial to try it out.
Thanks,
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: About last month, I just did 30 days trial on canvas pro but I just wanna try and Canvas didn’t contact me before the payment.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancle my subscription before the 30-day free trial ended but they aren't over yet and my account has already been charged for the full year

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I took the 30 day free trial. The pro subscription was supposed to start on the 20th of January. I cancelled on the 19th. I checked my invoice and found that I was charged on the 18th. Why was I charged so early??

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Please, I ask for your help! I need my money back. I was in a 30-day trial period, they did not notify me of the expiration of the time and they charged me. Please help! I have no money.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn’t mean to have it automatically renew. I had the 30 day free trial

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I wanted a 30-days free trial but got charged on the first day of the trial itself.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my free trial subscription within the 30 days.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I signed up for the 30 day free trial but a sum of £107.88 has been taken from my account.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good morning. I took the 30-day trial and did not see the email advising me to charge my Pro subscription. Today (01/14/2021). They charged my card. I would like to cancel. I didn't get to enjoy the service and it won't be useful for me. I thought I had made the cancellation, I would like the refund of the amount.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I signed on January 7th and had 30 days to cancel my subscription (try it free). I canceled today on February 3rd, but the charge continues. I ask for a refund since I canceled the account before the free 30 days, as written in your regulation

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought my free trial last day was on Jan 30, and that was my last day to cancel, then I would get charged on Jan 31st. I would like to cancel my premium membership and refund my last $16.99 charge.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I Didn't know it was going to auto charge me. I thought i would receive an email stating my free 30 days was expiring.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, I would like to request a refund for the subscription. I signed up for a 30-day trial and forgot to cancel, as I will not use it at the moment. Awaiting return! Thanks

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was charged for the subscription before the 30 day trial was over!

หมายเลขใบแจ้งหนี้: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I got my account debit because I forgot to cancel canva pro after it is free for 30 days and I am not going to continue using it. I would like to refund and cancel this use for me. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Only wanted 30 day trial, attempted to cancel on January 15th apparently it did go through. I would like a refund.

Refund request reason: I am requesting a refund if possible as I did not use the pro service except briefly the day I signed up. I did not have a chance to cancel until the day I was charged. 

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I used the 30 day free trial but was never notified that my subscription was ending and so I was charged for the full amount today for the upcoming month. Could you please issue a refund for this error? Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there. I forgot to cancel my 30-day trial. Please downgrade my membership and if possible, I would like a refund. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: It was written that I had 30 days free. When I put the card in it was already charged and my free days do not appear. Please return my money.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello. I did login and cancel my subscription before the 30 day trial expired but my credit card was charged any way. Can I please be refunded the $119 charge? Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I wish to be refunded for this subscription. I have accepted the 30 days offer but never subscribed for the Pro features following the 30 days trial. As you can see from my Canva account, I only use the free features, as I was convinced that my free trial had expired a long time ago, which intensified my surprise when I received the invoice of <NAME>€ earlier today.
I hope you give my case careful attention and hope to be refunded soon.
Cordially,
<NAME>
Refund request reason: Hello I did not request a subscription but a payment was refused to me for insufficient funds ... I did not want the Pro I only took the 30 days trial Invoice number: <NUMBER>

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello, about a month ago I requested a refund because the premium version was automatically charged to my card, and that is the moment where I have not received the refund and thus almost a month of that You told me that it could take from 10 days to 20 days and it has already been more than 20 days. I find it very bad that the refund has not been made so many days later

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I tried Canva Pro for 30 days and I was not satisfied with the service. That said, I would like to cancel the subscription and, therefore, I request a refund of the annual subscription fee. Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I cancelled my Canva Pro the day after the 30 day started as I didn't need the features but have been charged.
Please refund asap. 
Kind regards
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I just did 30 days trial on Canvas last month but I didn’t receive the notice before Canvas pro pack begin because I change my Email.So is it possible for me to get refund? Thank you
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I was not notified of renewal, nor did I use the funds after the 30 days

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: free trial 30 days - please refund and cancel
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Cancel my subscription the same day I buy it, I would like a refund for the warranty days please, thank you!
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I got the free 30-day trial option. Why was I charged on the first day?
Invoice #: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I would like a refund for the subscription that was automatically renewed. I had only used the 30 business days. Thank you, I hope you understand.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I didn't want to use the pro version anymore, I just wanted to do the 30-day trial. But I forgot to unsubscribe on time

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried Pro and it is not what i was looking for. i Missed the cancellation day.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: As soon as I did Canva, it didn't even take 30 days to charge me this other amount of 14.54. I want my money back

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forget to cancel subscription. To day is first day of new month so please help to issue refund.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I only wanted the 30 day free trial.

Refund request reason: I signed up for the free trial and was interested in paying the monthly charge. However, I tried the resume program once and did not complete it due to me having to be hospitalized long term. I tried to cancel the membership before the end of the 30 days but received error message and then the page just froze. 

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

หมายเลขใบแจ้งหนี้: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up for 30 days free with my credit card cut.  I couldn't cancel it, so I got cut.  Please return a little money because I didn't use it.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: The credit card was charged the value of the subscription, forget to cancel it after 30 days free. As you can see I have not used the services of the website or the application in more than a month. I don't want the subscription because I don't use it often.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: When I clicked on pricing it said try for 30 days for free, however I was charged.  I have not used the subscription tonight. Please cancel this charge.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I canceled days before billing date and do not understand how I am charged? Would like a refund thank  you so much.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please cancel my Canva Pro subscription. I meant to cancel after my 30-day trial.  Thank you.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good night! I did the test for 30 days of Canvas, however, on the last day of cancellation, which I would cancel because unfortunately I am unable to pay 322 reais in the year, at least now, the subscription fee was deducted from my card. It was a mistake because I would cancel on the day, but at night, because I work all day and I don’t take much on my cell phone to cancel. So please, I would like to request a refund. Since I already canceled, and I am now unable to keep the subscription. I ask you very much, thank you very much. Sincerely, <NAME> Santos.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I request a refund for a subscription because I made a mistake when choosing the plan, because I wanted to try the 30 days free and by mistake I chose the one-year option, I canceled the same day I canceled the subscription in the option that the refund could be possible and I would like to know when it will be deposited to me please.
Invoice No.: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I applied for a 30-day trial, but the app store payment was made today less than a month ago. I request cancellation.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didn't like using canva pro but I forget to cancel the 30 days free trial.

หมายเลขใบแจ้งหนี้: <NUMBER>

หมายเลขใบแจ้งหนี้: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up for free  And I didn't know I had to cancel before the 30 day was over, it was my mistake.  I didn't want to use canva pro for 1 year. I just want to try it for 30 days, but canva system has already debited my account.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I would like to organize a refund as I did not intend to purchase the subscription, rather just trial it for 30 days
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good morning. I have canceled my 1 month subscription. I want my annual billing refunded. I just wanted to try it for 30 days.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I took the free 30-day trial and the charge came before the deadline.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I don't have a need for Canva and don't want it past the 30 day trial.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: I tried CANVA 30 days for free. I never asked to take a one year subscription at 107 euros ...

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cannot afford Canva pro. I meant to cancel it before the 30 day free trial was up, but due to a passing in the family, I had forgotten about it.

Refund request reason: I signed up for free  And I didn't know I had to cancel before the 30 day was over, it was my mistake.  I didn't want to use canva pro for 1 year. I just want to try it for 30 days, but canva system has already debited my account.

<NAME>: <NUMBER>

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I signed the canva on the condition that if in 7 days I did not cancel, the charge would not be made. But the charge arrived. And I don't think it's fair to pay for something that I didn't even use. I didn't spend an entire day with the subscription. Even less a month, which is what is being charged. I want a refund or cancellation of the charge.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot that I had signed up for a free 30-day trial; and when I remembered, there had already passed 5 days. Right now, I already canceled my premiun suscription and technically, I have Canva Premiun until the 15th of February, but i truly don´t neeed it for anything. The main reason I acquired the free trial was to help my mother with something.

Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel my 30 day free trial.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: There was mention of a 30 day free trial which I wanted to try, but instead got charged 5 dollars. Please refund.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Sorry. Unfortunately, I ran out of the 30-day trial period to cancel. I would ask you to cancel my subscription, unfortunately I cannot sacrifice this amount for this now.

Refund request reason: I use free for your promotion in 30 days but I forgot cancel to use. I'm so sorry. Could I receive my money? Please

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I thought I had signed up for the 30 free days to try out your software. The software is not what I was looking for.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Thank you for your support. It seems that the 30-day time calculation for the free period was different from what I did. I was thinking of canceling today, but I'm confused because I've already paid. I would like a refund. Nice to meet you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Canceled the same day. Do not use.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I canceled my card, one week before the 30-day free trial ends, but apparently the system did not cancel my account and the charge was generated, that money I need for my university
